features: 5 BLADES FOR A LASTING SMOOTH: Each refill has 5 diamond-like coated blades to give you a close shave that lasts, and are designed to resist rust
LESS DRYNESS: The moisture bars with Olay skin conditioners, lock in moisture to keep skin dryness in check
SKIN PROTECTION: The razor's moisture bars release a rich body butter lather, guarding your skin against nicks, cuts and irritation. Brings seamless glide to every stroke
ADAPTIVE PIVOTING DESIGN: These women’s razors have a pivoting design that adjusts to your body for the ultimate precision
SUGARBERRY SCENTED moisture bars leave your skin smooth as you shave
body.description: Gillette Venus female razor blades are designed with a woman’s body in mind, and have what you need to give your skin the treatment it deserves. From handles designed for a comfortable grip, to pivoting heads that contour to curves, Venus razors for women are designed to help reveal touchably smooth skin. Venus ComfortGlide plus Olay with Sugarberry scent women’s razors have 5 diamond-like coated blades that provide you with up to 30 days of smooth shaves. The flexible moisture bars hydrate your skin instantly with Olay skin conditioners. Lock moisture into your skin while shaving to tackle dryness and protect your skin at the same time. The moisture bars release a rich body butter lather, guarding your skin against nicks, cuts and irritation. Brings seamless glide to every stroke. Venus ComfortGlide plus Olay women’s razors feature an adaptive, pivoting design that adjusts to your body’s contours and a rounded head that hugs curves and fits easily into hard to shave areas for a truly close shave. The Rose Gold colored metal handle is designed to last so you only need to change your blades. Did you know that any Venus blade refill fits any Venus razor handle (except Simply Venus and Venus Pubic Hair Razor)? Each blade refill lasts up to 30 days (based on 2/week shave).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these razors!
reviews.reviewText: I was using a less costly brand but the blade cartridge kept coming off and it was incredibly frustrating! The whole top of the razor is one piece, so nothing comes off until I need to change the cartridge. The blades are sharp for a close shave, but have a moisturized strip built around the blades, which protects from cutting while shaving. I don’t know why I stopped using Venus razors, but won’t use any other razor again! I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: There was nothing I disliked. Venus razors never seem to disappoint.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for coarse hair
reviews.reviewText: I have coarse leg hair that grows back super fast and have tried so many different razor brands over the years. The most recent one being Billie. These however are going to be my new go-to. They leave your skin super moisturized and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Excellent Pak using for clean the private part and bodyguard

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Me encantan, dejan muy suave la piel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The razor refills are nice and comfortable and the razor handle has a nice weight, seems well made. Classic Venus razor as usual. If only they were more affordable..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my wife. She says they work better than any blade she has tried before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Venus is my go to but not these blades
reviews.reviewText: I love the weight and shape of the body. The blades for these leave a lot to be desired. The large lubricating strips are gooey if they get too wet and if they are gone before the blade is dull then you are throwing it out anyway. Inside the strips are the plastic pieces that hold them on. Once they start poking thru, they will uncomfortably drag on your skin and even scrape. Not buying these blades again.
